finished_inscription:
Your registration is almost complete!
You just have to validate your email to access all the services offered by SaTT.
contact_support:
If you did not initiate this registration,
please contact the technical support.
create_secure:
Create an easily accessible and secure wallet
Select a strong password that you’ll remember
Of note, we are unable to help recover lost passwords.
monetisez_description: Whether you’re new to the social media landscape or are an established influencer, your audience size translates directly into your earnings. The SaTT platform leverages blockchain to automate your payments with uncompromising accuracy, every time.
automate_campaign_description:
You’ve got enough on your plate as is. Let’s lighten the load! On the SaTT platform,
you can quickly select influencers of any size, set the appropriate budget without the middleman, analyze your results, and automate the process from A to Z. All the while, competitive rates ensure that you’re getting the most bang for your buck.
questions_description: We’re here to support you! Our dedicated support staff is always within reach via our social platforms. Let’s find answers, together.
ask_pass: You asked to reset your login password
reject_reason: What is the reason of the rejection ?
valid_wish: The Satt team wishes you good luck
valid_accepted: campaign has been validated by the advertiser.
reject_cmp: campaign has been rejected by the advertiser.
valid_question: When and how do I get my earnings ?
valid_gaz: You can collect your gains at any time, but keep in mind that every transactions cost gas! Remember to verify that you own some ethereum or Binance coins in your wallet in order to do any action interfering with the blockchain.
link: Click on the link below to reset it
reset_pass3: If you did not make this request, ignore this Email
changement_email_presque_terminé: Your request to change your email address is almost complete !
